home.title: Unified OpenLDAPS Management Service of INSEE

landing.title: Unified OpenLDAPS Management Service of INSEE
landing.description: Search allows you to search the contacts of a domain, and if you have the right to modify it, modify its password and delete the selected contacts. Create allows you to create a new contact on a management domain on which you are a manager

search_user.title: Find a user in the Realm

identifiant.name: Identifier
identifiant.help_text: It is not mandatory to seize it entirely.The entered field can be the beginning, the middle or end of the desired identifier.The identifier of a contact / organization is unique in the directory.The search will be more accurate.

description.name: Description
description.help_text: It is not mandatory to seize it entirely.The entered field can be the beginning, the middle or end of the sought-after name.Authorized characters: alphabetics, figures, apostrophes, spaces, dashes

organization.name: Organization of belonging

organization.help_text: It is not mandatory to seize it entirely.The entered field must be the beginning of the desired identifier.

email.help_text: The entered field can be a portion of the desired mail address.
